Body.Content:
Starting on November 27, 2025, the insights widget in the analytics page will no longer be available. The functionality of this widget, in addition to the ability to drill down to view the metrics of individual questions and answers, is now available in the feature Analyze user questions by theme.

How does this affect me?
The insights widget will be removed from the analytics page.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness, and no action is required.

Title: Microsoft Copilot Studio â€“ Removal of the Insights widget from analytics page
